ARABIC: مَّنْ أَعْرَضَ عَنْهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحْمِلُ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ وِزْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who turn away from it will bear a heavy burden on the Day of Rising,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Whoever turns away from it will surely carry a burden on the Day of Judgement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He who turns away from it will surely bear a heavy burden on the Day of Resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whoever disregards (the Quran) will be heavily burdened with sin on the Day of Judgment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Whoever turns away from it, will bear a burden on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Whoever turns away from it, verily, they will bear a heavy burden on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Whoever turns aside from it, he shall surely bear a burden on the day of resurrection
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Whosoever turns away from it, upon the Day of Resurrection He shall bear a fardel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Whoso turneth away from it, he verily will bear a burden on the Day of Resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Whoever turns away from it will bear a heavy burden on the Day of Judgement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Whosoever turnoth away therefrom--verily they shall bear on the Day of Judgment a burthen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Whoever disregards it shall bear a burden [of punishment] on the Day of Resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If any do turn away therefrom, verily they will bear a burden on the Day of judgment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Whoever turns away from it (this Quran i.e. does not believe in it, nor acts on its orders), verily, they will bear a heavy burden (of sins) on the Day of Resurrection,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Whosoever has turned away from it shall bear a burden on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Whoever turns away from it will carry on the Day of Resurrection a burden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:100] Whoever turns away from it, and does not believe in it, he shall indeed, on the Day of Resurrection, bear a burden, a heavy load of sin;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Whoso turneth away from it) whoever disbelieves in it, (he verily will bear a burden) idolatry (on the Day of Resurrection)
